title: Mark Zuckerberg dismisses co-founder’s call to break up Facebook
text: Zuckerberg, in an interview with French broadcaster France 2, was responding to an op-ed written by Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes, who said Zuckerberg had acquired ‘unprecendented and un-American’ power.

title: Zuckerberg says breaking up Facebook “isn’t going to help”
text: With the look of someone betrayed, Facebook’s CEO has fired back at co-founder Chris Hughes and his brutal NYT op-ed calling for regulators to split up Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. “When I read what he wrote, my main reaction was that what he’s proposing that we do isn’t going to do anything to help solve […]

title: 5 Things to Know About Facebook’s Cryptocurrency Ambitions
text: Is the world’s largest social network developing its own currency?
